document.heading: Tenant-Owned Voting in Conversion Election Clarification Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-247, the “Tenant-Owned Voting in Conversion Election Clarification Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-267 which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Urban Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 1, 2008, and July 15, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 4, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-494 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-247 became effective on October 22, 2008.
